column4: Hi, I've just upgraded to Lucid with the alternate CD, my wireless connection doesn't work anymore
is it that you can't maintain a wireless conection or you can't even see the networks?
can't even see the networks i guess. The icon says the "wired" connection is.. not connected, but I don't know how to change to "wireless"
ok sorry I don't know what up with yours I am having a simaler problem
